text: Emrich Nicholson (1913–2001) was an American art director.Kitses p.132 ==Selected filmography== * The Countess of Monte Cristo (1948) * Son of Ali Baba (1952) * Just Across the Street (1952) * Taza, Son of Cochise (1954) * Magnificent Obsession (1954) ==References== ==Bibliography== Demetrius John Kitses. Horizons West; Anthony Mann, Budd Boetticher, Sam Peckinpah: studies of authorship within the western. Indiana University Press, 1970. ==External links== * Category:1913 births Category:2001 deaths Category:American art directors
title: Emrich Nicholson
